name: Aof United
startIntroPart1: President Aof United. the union is heading towards prosperity, Truly you must to build this country
startIntroPart2: Holla Presidente!. can you buliding the Aof United this the time?
introduction: I am Aus Denman, President of Aof United. We'll treat you with honor and respect, if you do the same.
declaringWar: I'am declaring war to you. maybe you have a bad reputation.
attacked: What do you want if you declare war? Well then... then you looked for it.
defeated: This is unfortunate, after all, you are the victor.
hateHello: You want to cause trouble again?!
hateNo: How could you think I would accept that!?
tradeRequest: Hello. we trading with good trade. economy and society
uniques: [+60]% Production when constructing [Gunpowder] units [in your cities] <during a Golden Age>
[-30]% unhappiness from the number of cities <during a Golden Age>

name: Swistika
startIntroPart1: Chairman Leader of Communist Party Swistika. glory to Empire, truly you must to build this country
startIntroPart2: Zdrastuyta, predseatel' Kommunist!. can you buliding the Swistika this the time?
introduction: Welcome to our Red and Black lands. I hope that our nations grow strong and in peace.
declaringWar: I'am will destroy your nation for glory to Swistika.
attacked: Come this far. But ye wished it so. Next time, be so good. i'am will later to destorying you,
defeated: Is over. my nation is over.
tradeRequest: I'am make this deal. do you want?
uniques: [+20]% Strength for cities <in [Tundra] tiles> <during a Golden Age>
